website_summaries.verdict: Above-average design and capability with smart safety features for an all-around excellent mini-donut baking experience.
pros: 2 plates in addition to donut plate
Premium nonstick coating that cleans easily, especially with included nylon scrubby
Temperature selection to accommodate different types of batter
Cord wraps around appliance for easy storage
Bright red color decorative enough to be kept on the counter
cons: Some reports that plates don’t heat up enough to cook inside the advertised time

customer_reviews.title: Great snake maker to make snack for my kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy the snack that I make with this snack marker, especially the animal pattern. They finished all of the snacks that I made for them. The machine is very easy to use and no sticky at all, no messy after use and simply rinse with water. I owned an old one and waste a lot of pancake mix because the cooking plate is not deep enough. This one is perfect. The 3 different tray are able to switch depends on what my kids like at the day. definitely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing product. I bought it for my sons. The waffles looked so cute and tasted so good. They ate a lot. It took about 3 minutes to cook . I am very happy. I will add waffle to our family breakfast menu! This waffle maker is also very easy to clean. Make your life easier. I am so glad that I bought it. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Plastic burning smell
customer_reviews.text: The concept was great - love the different options and the removable plates is a definite plus, however the smell it made when it was on was terrible! Like a toxic plastic smoldering smell ... I thought it would go away after the first or second time but it didn’t and I don’t want to be inhaling in anything bad ! Returned it... it’s a shame as it’s very cute and has nicely designed plates
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard. Overheats and melts internal parts.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. It got so hot it melted the plastic pins that hold the plates in place and can’t hold any plates anymore. I liked the standard plate and the kid friendly shapes, but the heating was very inconsistent and the device was tough to clean. The quality was subpar. Even the letters on the top started to rub off! It only lasted a few months, and was completely unusable after that.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good value for young chef
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twelve year old who likes to bake. It is age appropriate. Good value good price. Easy to use and really makes pancakes and waffles with great definition. The plates can be tricky but once you get it, you got it!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen / Scranton

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, simple to use. Takes a while for it to heat up, each waffle takes about 10-15 minutes to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Akkinight

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: They’re not kidding when they say mini. Not only was the iron tiny...it didn’t work well at all. It smelled like plastic when it heated up. The exchangeable plates were poorly designed and batter would not release. I used it once and planned to throw it out. It fell off a shelve and shattered, so yeah...piece of junk. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter enjoy the cartoon shapes cake
customer_reviews.text: My little two daughters don’t like to eat .They like to play .They are picky.That is a big problem.It bothers me a lot .But today I try to make breakfast with this waffle maker .They are happy to have it .They eat it really quickly and say it is yummy.I am so touching.It is a great waffle maker.It is easy to clean and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Jacson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Its a good waffle maker for at home use. It doesnt get super hot so yes it takes a minute to actually brown your waffle but they taste so much better than Belgium waffles. Our son loves the little shape waffles and my wife normally makes a big batch at once and then freezes them so she has them already made when it has to to quick. 4 stars because it takes so long for the waffles to brown but other than that no complaints at all. Super easy to take apart once it has cooled off and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful waffle maker with endless options
customer_reviews.text: Love the different options on the plates. Purchased this to make waffles with my granddaughter and we use it every time I go visit. She loves making something different with each plate. We have made donuts, blueberry and chocolate chip smiley face waffles and one of her favorites, cinnamon roll heart waffles. They were all great.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: The shaped waffles are very cute, love look! Great for snack and breakfast, easy and fast. This waffle make is so easy to use, that older children can assist in making the waffles. The waffles can be the shade color that you desire. Very easy to turn the waffle over, also extremely easy to clean. Love this waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I would teturn it but I let the 30 window go by before I used it. Waffles do not brown and get crispy on the outside. Smell from it while heating and cooking was terrible. Temperature control knob on the top gets extremely hot. Do not recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: One of the plates got stuck first time using it and it broke now won’t stay on at all. Feels like a waste 😒
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Shapeless Waffles
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker does a very poor job of making the shapes it proposes. It also takes forever to cook the waffles.
customer_reviews.author: AUde

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this often, and it's easy to clean and use. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Coelho

customer_reviews.title: The recipe in the instruction manual makes veryvery dense waffles.
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to cook a waffle, but otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The shell is hot, but its manufacturer is equipped with a heat-resistant glove, which I can accept.
customer_reviews.author: yumi

customer_reviews.title: Great item but temperature is not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but poor quality. The heat is not high enough to cook my waffle. The color of my waffle is very pale. Since it is not working well I had to use my Belgian waffle maker. When I used my regular Belgian waffle maker it tasted so much better due to high temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Smith

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses ( few uses mean between 3 to 5 uses) it just stop working.. is easy to use but doesn't last nothing.
customer_reviews.author: jose flores

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use and easy to clean. My daughter loves that she can get animals print on her waffle.
customer_reviews.author: Sa12ahYu

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bad product got the insurance never got my money back product is defective
customer_reviews.author: charity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we hoped for. It's easy to use, clean and store. Even my young teenagers easily make their own breakfast with this.
customer_reviews.author: ASmith

customer_reviews.title: Fun waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 yr old son for Christmas because he loves making breakfast. This waffle maker was perfect - compact for easy storage and easy enough for a 9 yr old to use independently. We like the variety of plates to make different shapes and the fact they are removable makes clean up pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife, she absolutely loves it. It comes with several different plates for different shapes. Works great, easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Martin

customer_reviews.title: This product is  NOT  very good...
customer_reviews.text: what mother has a long time getting breakfast in mornings? it takes so long to get this thing working and then it slows down after one pancake...took me almost an hour to make 4 pancakes on this.. looks pretty is about all I can say..goes to pile of no good products..Beverly
customer_reviews.author: beverly boulianne

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: This maker makes the cutest little waffles. Each one is not more than a couple of bites, but they are so fun. My children just love making waffles in this maker. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kevinshi

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the chinese recipes hahaha
customer_reviews.text: Made the conversions to english system for measuring and the recipe for the waffles is for one waffle and its not so yummy. Works great, also takes longer than 4-6 mins per waffle, not a big deal just funny.
customer_reviews.author: Ikka James

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use waffle maker. Easy to clean up after as long as you don’t overfill. The kids love the shapes and really enjoy the food. It does take a bit of time to make enough food for two kids so someone has to be constantly making the waffle while everyone is eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This had been great. Love that it comes with different plates for variety. That was why I originally chose this one. It's easy to clean. I did smell the "plastic" odor at first, but I think it is just the protective oil burning off. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mustlovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to play with. He downside is the unit itself takes forever to cool down. You cannot change the plates until the whole thing is cooled of.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Have a nice breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids. Would be more helpful if it had a timer on it. The indicator lights are only for power and when it is at temp. You need to use an external timer nothing on the unit to tell you it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia tt

customer_reviews.title: love variety of style
customer_reviews.text: love this product, easy to use, easy to clean and make the day better
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hitryh

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: It didn't get hot enough to cook waffles, but did get got enough so I couldn't turn the temp dial. Cute idea, I wish it worked. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Jones

customer_reviews.title: my daughter makes breakfast with it happily every morning
customer_reviews.text: was a little smelly at first. then works fine. my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: soniazhang

customer_reviews.title: broke after the second use
customer_reviews.text: The internal parts that hold the plates are made of plastic so when it heats up, they melted and no longer worked. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MLMoran

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!  POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker burns anything you put near it... poor temperature distribution. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Warren

product_meta.title: Finether Waffle Maker Machine, Multi-Plate Waffle Iron, Mini 3-in-1 Non-Stick Snack Maker Adjustable Temperature, Easy to Clean, Cord Wrap & Cool Touch Handle, Red
feature_bullets: Adjustable temperature control & indicator lights: with a knob for any heat setting between Min and Max, you can set your own waffle or cake color or style-golden or brown, fluffy or crisp; heating-up and ready-to-cook light tell you when it is ready to be used;
Safe to use: cool touch handle allows you safely open the maker to peek during baking; non-slip feet keep it in place when in use; heat-resistant bakelite housing prevents scalds during baking;
Space-saving storage: easy push down lock latch with cord wrap design allows the maker to be stored upright so it doesn't hog counter or cabinet space;

Make perfect snacks without the mess: thermally engineered heating elements ensure even heat distribution; the top waffle plate is attached with a floating hinge to ensure uniform thickness and even baking; the wrap-around overflow moat on the plates catches excess batter

Detachable non-stick cooking plates: a premium non stick coating prevents snacks from sticking and getting ruined and reduces oil or butter required; it can be easily detached and cleaned with non-abrasive nylon scrubby and lasts longer since you don’t scratch the plates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars79 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
